H0.text: The floor was being built during this stage of construction when workers dug round holes in the ground and filled them with steel and concrete.

H1.text: The foundation is the part of the new building being constructed when workers dug round holes in the ground and filled them with steel and concrete.

H2.text: The plumbing was the part of the building being constructed during the stage when workers dug round holes in the ground and filled them with steel and concrete.

H3.text: The walls were being built during this stage of construction when workers dug round holes in the ground and filled them with steel and concrete.

A4.text: In engineering, a foundation is the element of a structure which connects it to the ground or more rarely, water (as with floating structures), transferring loads from the structure to the ground.
